SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, B.name, A.pv, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, IF(A.reg_dt > date_sub(now(), interval 1 day),'Y','N') dsp_new_dt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment C WHERE A.seq = C.board_seq) AS comment FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.id WHERE A.type = #{type}
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR B.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%'))
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
AND A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%'))
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT #{start_row_num}, #{post_num_base_cnt}

SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, B.name, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment C WHERE A.seq = C.board_seq) AS comment, (SELECT D.title FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq < #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_page_title, (SELECT D.title FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq > #{seq} ORDER BY seq ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_page_title, (SELECT D.seq FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq < #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_seq, (SELECT D.seq FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq > #{seq} ORDER BY seq ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_seq FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.id WHERE A.type = #{type} AND A.seq = #{seq} ORDER BY A.seq DESC

SELECT A.content, C.name, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, REPLACE(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%p %H:%i'),'AM','오전'),'PM','오후') reg_dt_hms FROM board_comment A JOIN board B ON A.board_seq = B.seq LEFT JOIN user C ON A.user_id = C.id WHERE B.type = #{type} AND A.board_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{start_row_num}, #{post_num_base_cnt}
